channel.title: Mackinaw City Michigan on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Semi overturns on Mackinac Bridge in storms of July 18, 2013
item.description: The photo below of an overturned semi-tractor trailer on the Mackinac Bridge is from Lora Brown, as posted to Facebook, and as reposted to Twitter by Kristi Steffen (@Upsilky66). The driver was not hurt, and the bridge has reopened. MT @Upsilky66: Photo of overturned semi on #MackinacBridge. Bridge is closed to all traffic. pic.twitter.com/dAJO81YjiV #Breaking #WCMU — CMU Public Radio (@WCMUNews) July 19, 2013 Apparently a semi tipped over on the bridge and almost went over the railing #mackinacbridge
